Name: SunSenSim™
About the game: SunSenSim™ ~ a simulation to sense the sun¡ isa fast-paced, beat em' up, shoot em' up kinda game! w a s d, top-down 2D, psychedelic bullet heaven... a singleplayer, space racing, open world parkour, PvE... m superhero combat survival, physics sorta game : ) The objective is to drift, dodge, & shoot; without being got! Flow fast, as you certainly can; crash with might & grace~ w = push a = left s = pull d = right q = flare e = block x = map scroll = scale mouse = aim mb1 = attract mb2 = repel mb3 = ghost Lshift = time enjoy : )
